name: 'GLITT3R GUTS' Original Hand Painted Skate Deck
description:
Glitter guts was the first skatedeck I ever painted, so he holds a special place in my heart. Nonetheless, it's time for Guts to move onto his forever home, as I have no space left in my studio. 

Would you like to adopt Guts? Let me tell you about him. Guts was created using a fine acrylic paint, layered onto an 100% recycled skate deck that was tinted green. His face was originally a plastic bumper attached to the board, which started to fall apart; I sealed it with wood putty and sanded it back, to create babysoft cheeks for his acrylic rhinestone eyes to sit in. You can see all his guts, and some irregularly located bones lined in golden metallic paint, covered in glitter. He is a special fellow, and is sealed, weatherproof and ready to hang as soon as he finds his forever home. 

You can see a clearer photo of his body here:
http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=135502293190788&set=a.135502273190790.33951.121728241234860

I will consider overseas adoptions for Guts. Email amzkelso@gmail.com if you are overseas, but you want to give him his forever home!

name: 'Uké Yume Kirin', Original Hand Painted Ukulele
description:
Inspired by the kickass tale of The Last Unicorn, I drew up this Unicorn Princess turned human, catching fallen stars in dusky grass, for the Melbourne Ukulele festival. This lady was paraded all over town, from High Street Northcote to Spring Street in the CBD! She's got mileage on her, as well as a lot of gold thread and a couple rhinestones. 

The Ukulele's face has been drawn with pencils and watercolour onto the soft wood, with acrylic paint on both the sides and back of the piece. Stars have been cut out and sanded in the body of the Uke, creating the dusky sky for the princess to pluck stars from.

More photos can be seen here: http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.135502273190790.33951.121728241234860

This piece is UNSEALED, which means you can't take her outside, or bathe her, or drool on her (sorry). She's also unplayable (you can see, I've cut stars out of the body of the ukulele), this is a display piece only.

For overseas postage quotes, email me at amzkelso@gmail.com!

name: "Not Just Another Page" Original Hand Painted Skate Deck
description:
"Bettie Page was an American model who became famous in the 1950s for her pin-up photos. Often referred to as the "Queen of Pinups", her jet black hair, blue eyes, and trademark bangs have influenced artists for generations".... 'Not Just Another Page' is a Bettie Page tribute, adorned with glitter, gold and leopard print. This is an 100% recycled skate deck, (yay for the environment!), cut to accentuate her curves. Perfect 50's waistline!

Mediums include ink, acrylic, OTR acrylic markers, glitter, nail polish, copic markers and fineliner.

Board is ultra smooth and sealed with a high gloss, Marine grade varnish, and is water resistant, fade resistant and weather resistant. This baby will last!

As this is a skate deck I can't really scan this baby, so this is a 100% one off original, no prints to be made or nothin'! Get your claws on this baby while it lasts! Will be very sad to see this one go, but I've run out of space in my studio. I have marked the price down because I need it shifted, to make space for new projects.

Please email me for overseas postage quotes at amzkelso@gmail.com!

name: "GLDYCWN" Original Hand Painted Skate Deck
description:
"GLDYCWN" is a recycled skate deck, hand painted as a personal comission.

Features a super rad Goldicorn, half unicorn- half goldfish! The japanese Kanji '金' on the speechy-demon-bubble reads 'KIN' for 'GOLD'. Accented with a metallic gold acrylic speech-bubble, with japanese washi paper and rhinestone embellishments collaged into the scales.

Close-up's can be seen here, as well as a couple of progess shots:
http://amzkelso.tumblr.com/tagged/GLDYCWN

Mediums include ink, acrylic, japanese washi paper, rhinestones/faux crystals and fineliner.

Board is ultra smooth and sealed with a high gloss, Marine grade varnish, and is water resistant, fade resistant and weather resistant. This baby will last!

As this is a skate deck I can't really scan this baby, so this is a 100% one off original, no prints to be made or nothin'! Get your claws on this baby while it lasts! Will be very sad to see this one go, but I've run out of space in my studio. I have marked the price down because I need it shifted, to make space for new projects.

Please email me for overseas postage quotes at amzkelso@gmail.com!

name: "Please be mine, Oh, Kay" Original Hand-Painted Skate Deck
description:
"Please be mine, Oh, Kay" is a recycled skate deck, custom painted and exhibited at No Vacancy's 'Creature Feature' exhibition.

Features the Creature from the Black Lagoon proposing to Doctor Kay Lawrence with a pearl upon a clam, stars hang in the sky around them and the ship 'Rita' can be seen sitting on the lake. Accented with a metallic gold acrylic halo around Miss Kay and glitter on both her lips and in his eyes to add a shimmer. The perfect ending I wanted so badly but never happened. Poor Gill-man was just lonely...!

Close-up's can be seen here, as well as a couple of progess shots:
http://amzkelso.tumblr.com/tagged/Creature-of-the-Black-Lagoon

Mediums include ink, acrylic, glitter and nail polish.

Board is ultra smooth and sealed with a high gloss, Marine grade varnish, and is water resistant, fade resistant and weather resistant. This baby will last!

As this is a skate deck I can't really scan this baby, so this is a 100% one off original, no prints to be made or nothin'! Get your claws on this baby while it lasts! Will be very sad to see this one go (it's my favourite skate deck project of all time... Not going to lie, price is a little high because I don't really want it to go!), but I've run out of space in my studio. I have marked the price down because I need it shifted, to make space for new projects.


Please email me for overseas postage quotes at amzkelso@gmail.com!
